meta.title: Avalon Pasadena - Apartments in Pasadena, CA | AvalonBay Communities | AvalonBay Communities

meta.name: title
meta.content: Avalon Pasadena - Apartments in Pasadena, CA | AvalonBay Communities

div.span: We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. Welcome to a breathtaking series of home-style apartments at Avalon Pasadena. Discover lovely one- and two-bedroom Pasadena apartments with quartz countertops, tile backsplash, stainless steel appliances, spacious walk-in closets and so much more. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. The community itself is the best place to spend your leisure time with facilities that include a fitness center, a sparkling pool and spa, and sundecks. The combination of great services and a courteous, professional staff make Avalon Pasadena an ideal place for you to live. This is not just apartment living. This is living up. PASADENA APARTMENTS BY AVALON Pasadena offers a whole new world of exciting experiences. Perfectly situated in the heart of the Playhouse District, Avalon Pasadena is surrounded by the city's best restaurants and is close to fantastic retail stores on South Lake Avenue and in Old Town Pasadena. These include Paseo Marketplace, Barney’s Beanery, Cheesecake Factory, and many more. There will never be a dull moment when you make the Avalon Pasadena your home. PASADENA APARTMENT COMMUNITY When you decide on moving into these wonderful Pasadena apartments, you will also discover the amazing Avalon Advantage. This program offers a wonderful collection of assurances to residents. All routine maintenance is addressed within one business day of a resident's request to the management. Avalon also works individually with you to customize leasing terms that meet your needs. If you're relocating, Avalon will also be happy to help you to find a new home in one of its many beautiful communities. So what are you waiting for? Contact us to schedule an appointment and discover the best Pasadena apartments today!

div.h2: The service. The standards. The life.

a.div: Great service is one of the things we think about most. We start with selecting passionate people. Then we let them put that passion to work. Our people are a vital part of what shapes the character of each Avalon community.

We strive to align our standards with yours, delivering an experience that lives up to them. We know you've put a lot into getting to where you are in life. We believe where you live should reflect that. So we put ourselves into making sure it does.

Effortless. Enjoyable. Truly comfortable living is both. That's why we go out of our way to choose locations and to design amenities that put so much within reach. So you can live easy without even trying.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.h2: Only the best for your best life

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: See what we do to take pet friendly living to the next level.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: From fitness amenities to resident perks, we offer a variety of spaces and places to help you meet your wellness goals.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Affordable homes for rent available through the affordable housing program for qualifying future residents.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our technology package gives you ease of access and can allow you to save on monthly expenses.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

h3.class: ant-typography community-amenities-title font-primary font-24 text-default font-weight-normal

div.div: Cats and dogs are welcome. Please check the dog breed and pet restrictions.

div.p: We are here for you. Let us know how we can help you find your perfect home.

We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. Welcome to a breathtaking series of home-style apartments at Avalon Pasadena. Discover lovely one- and two-bedroom Pasadena apartments with quartz countertops, tile backsplash, stainless steel appliances, spacious walk-in closets and so much more. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. The community itself is the best place to spend your leisure time with facilities that include a fitness center, a sparkling pool and spa, and sundecks. The combination of great services and a courteous, professional staff make Avalon Pasadena an ideal place for you to live. This is not just apartment living. This is living up. PASADENA APARTMENTS BY AVALON Pasadena offers a whole new world of exciting experiences. Perfectly situated in the heart of the Playhouse District, Avalon Pasadena is surrounded by the city's best restaurants and is close to fantastic retail stores on South Lake Avenue and in Old Town Pasadena. These include Paseo Marketplace, Barney’s Beanery, Cheesecake Factory, and many more. There will never be a dull moment when you make the Avalon Pasadena your home. PASADENA APARTMENT COMMUNITY When you decide on moving into these wonderful Pasadena apartments, you will also discover the amazing Avalon Advantage. This program offers a wonderful collection of assurances to residents. All routine maintenance is addressed within one business day of a resident's request to the management. Avalon also works individually with you to customize leasing terms that meet your needs. If you're relocating, Avalon will also be happy to help you to find a new home in one of its many beautiful communities. So what are you waiting for? Contact us to schedule an appointment and discover the best Pasadena apartments today!","previewWordCount":50},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}},{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/PricingOverview","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/PricingOverview","id":"f0f6orH4t3ae3Us","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"imgSrc":"https://cloudfront-us-east-1.images.arcpublishing.com/avalonbay/GXSAHEHZHFHK7KWYDH6Y5QPGIM.jpg","imgAlt":null,"furnishedDescription":"Furnished+ offers all the essential items you need to move in plus conveniences like flexible lease terms, included utilities, and immediate access to highspeed Wi-Fi and cable TV."},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}},{"collection":"chains","type":"CORE_CommunityBrandCards","props":{"collection":"chains","type":"CORE_CommunityBrandCards","id":"c0fSPpQgt3ae33H","customFields":{"title":"The service.\nThe standards.\nThe life."},"displayProperties":{}},"children":[{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityBrandCard","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityBrandCard","id":"f0fSPi68t3ae34u","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"title":"The Service","link":"/","description":"Great service is one of the things we think about most.
